title: Oil Steadies After Three-Day Rally as Traders Weigh Iran Risks
description: Oil steadied after surging more than 3% on Thursday as traders weighed US President Donald Trump’s threats against Iran, and how a potential escalation in hostilities could impact flows from the Middle East.
content: Oil steadied after surging more than 3% on Thursday as traders weighed US President Donald Trump’s threats against Iran, and how a potential escalation in hostilities could impact flows from the Middle East.
